short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows Yoko Networks customers to highlight a phone number and by clicking initiate the call from their phone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click to call for Yoko Networks hosted VoIP systems. This extension allows customers to highlight a phone number and by clicking initiate the call from their desk phone or softphone
